text.0: invoked to drink the soma juice come with thy bay steeds thunderarmed.
text.2: our priest is seated true to time the grass is regularly strewn.
text.3: the pressingstones were set at morn.
text.4: these prayers o thou who hearest prayer are offered seat thee on the grass.
text.6: o vṛtraslayer be thou pleased with these libations with these hymns.
text.8: our hymns caress the lord of strength vast drinker of the somas juice.
text.10: delight thee with the juice we pour for thine own great munificence.
text.11: yield not thy singer to reproach.
text.12: we indra dearly loving thee bearing oblation sing thee hymns.
text.14: o thou to whom thy bays are dear loose not thy horses far from us.
text.15: here glad thee indra lord divine.
text.16: may longmaned coursers dropping oil bring thee on swift car hitherward.
text.17: indra to seat thee on the grass.
